summary.span: Fornisce accesso ai valori della proprietà dell'oggetto utilizzando le funzioni di accesso o .

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

.property instance bool IsReadOnly
Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Ottiene un valore che indica se il valore di un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] è di sola lettura.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: se il valore è di sola lettura; se può essere modificato.

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un controllo deve essere relativo impostato su `true` e il relativo impostato su `false` prima della creazione di un oggetto.A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente, un che supporta il pattern di controllo presenta un valore incrementato o decrementato la specifica del controllo valore.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

summary.span: Ottiene il valore della modifica estesa specifico del controllo, aggiunto o sottratto dalla proprietà .

span.span: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.

value.span: Valore della modifica estesa o se l'elemento non supporta .

span.span: The large-change value or if the element does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente, un che supporta il pattern di controllo presenta un valore incrementato o decrementato la specifica del controllo valore.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. summary.span: Ottiene il valore di intervallo massimo supportato dall'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: Il valore massimo supportato dal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o se l'elemento non supporta .

span.span: The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente, un che supporta il pattern di controllo è il valore impostato sul valore massimo di specifica del controllo.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value set to the control-specific maximum value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104Maximum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#104maximum)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104Maximum](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#104maximum)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#104)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

span.span: Gets the current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

value.span: Il valore corrente di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o se l'elemento non supporta .

span.span: The current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente, un oggetto ottenuto da un controllo di destinazione viene passato a una funzione che recupera l'oggetto corrente i valori delle proprietà.In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current property values. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#102)]
